Is there anything strange about your JVM?  It looks like it is
using the gnu.xml.aelfred2 XML parser, and this is failing.
Do you have a specific CLASSPATH set somehow?

Not that I know

It's the 1.5 update 6 from sun.com

It contains JfreeGraph and MysqlConnectore in its ext directory, not much...
I doubt that Sun ships with the gnu parser :) How did you install it on your machine?
